fc0abe67-e19d-4c3b-9ea0-90da31f9834b.title: SUPPORT TO A KOUMASSI CONFESSIONAL SCHOOL (PUNCTUAL )
fc0abe67-e19d-4c3b-9ea0-90da31f9834b.description:
Preserve the transmission of knowledge and faith.

This project consists of rehabilitating and improving the infrastructure of the Sabil-Sa-Adat Koranic  School located in  Koumassi in order to offer a dignified, secure and adapted learning environment.
“The mosques of Allah are maintained by those who believe…” (Quran 9:18)
Why give?</div>
This Koranic school operates in precarious conditions that limit the quality of teaching.
An unsuitable environment directly impacts children.
How does your donation actually help?
Infrastructure renovation
Improved hygiene and sanitation
Lighting installation and ventilation
Creating a safe space
<div> real impact
✔ Better learning conditions
✔ Healthy and safe environment
Reinforced✔ transmission of religious knowledge
fc0abe67-e19d-4c3b-9ea0-90da31f9834b.impact:
Improve infrastructure for a dignified learning environment
Ensuring a safe and student-friendly environment
Strengthening the quality of religious education
fc0abe67-e19d-4c3b-9ea0-90da31f9834b.process:
1. Receipt of the file 
2. Evaluation and visit 
3. Committee validation 
4. Disbursement by tranches 
5. Monitoring and reporting

ad994313-e36a-4c44-a719-3a363c63aed2.title: RENOVATION OF THE OLD MOSQUE OF KOUMASSI (PUNCTUAL )
ad994313-e36a-4c44-a719-3a363c63aed2.description:
Renovating a mosque. Restoring dignity. Changing lives.
At the heart of our community, the ancient mosque of Koumassi still stands… but barely.
• Its doors are fragile.
• Water seeps in with every rainfall.
• For lack of carpet, the elders kneel on the cold tiles.
And yet, every day, families continue to gather there to prayst and learn.
A real project, ready to start
It's not an abstract idea. This is a concrete project, already planned:
Validated✔ plans
Detailed✔ Quote Available
✔ Follow-up provided by the Imam and the Management Committee
✔ Transparency guaranteed via Amane+
The spiritual value of your gift
The Prophet said, “He who buildshe built a mosque for Allah, Allah builds him a house in Paradise. ”
Today, this opportunity is in your hands.
Why give?
• A degraded mosque limits access to prayer, learning and community life.
• The faithful pray in precarious conditions, sometimes unworthy.
• Your donation transforms a fragile place into a spacethis sacred welcoming and dignified.
How does your donation actually help?
Your contribution funds:
•  A clean and comfortable prayer area (carpet, ventilation, lighting)
• A functional ablution area with access to water
•  Toilets for men and women, for more dignity
•  A sound system for sermons and prayers）RES
• Interior and exterior finishes (paint, ceiling, doors)
The impact of your gesture
• You restore dignity to the faithful.
• You create a place of knowledge and spirituality for future generations.
• You write your name in a work that exceeds time.

 Together, let's make the Koumassi Mosque a place ofth light and peace.
ad994313-e36a-4c44-a719-3a363c63aed2.impact:
Rehabilitate the mosque to provide a dignified and secure prayer space
Improve infrastructure (ablutions, sanitation, essential equipment)
Create a sustainable place for spirituality, education and community gathering
ad994313-e36a-4c44-a719-3a363c63aed2.process:
1. Receipt of the request
 2. Visit and assessment 
3. Committee validation 
4. Purchase and installation 
5. Acceptance of works
beneficiaries: Places of worship in a state of degradation

a787c660-eba2-4a37-a6be-0ace74da8fb7.title: SEASONAL ZAKAT EL FITR
a787c660-eba2-4a37-a6be-0ace74da8fb7.description:
1.Whatis Zakat al-Fitr?
Zakat al-Fitr is a mandatory alms that every Muslim must pay before the end of the month of Ramadan.
It is an obligatory alms for any Muslim (man, woman, child) with a surplus of food for the day and night of Eid. .
2. When can we start paying for it?
According to the majority opinion of the ma schoolslikite and hanbalite, it is permissible to pour Zakat al-Fitr up to two days before the Eid prayer.
3. What is the cut-off time for distribution?
Distribution to beneficiaries follows a strict time rule:
• The ideal time (Sunnah): Between the dawn of the day of Eid and just before the Eid prayer.
• The deadline: It must imperatively be saidtribe before the Eid prayer. If it is paid after the prayer, it is no longer considered as Zakat al-Fitr but as a simple alms (Sadaqa), unless there is a valid excuse (technical problem, unforeseen delay)
a787c660-eba2-4a37-a6be-0ace74da8fb7.impact:
Purification: It purifies the fasting person from the futile or indecent words spoken during the month of Ramadan.
   Solidarity: It allows the needy to celebrate Eid without having to beg for food on that day
a787c660-eba2-4a37-a6be-0ace74da8fb7.process:
1. Zakat El Fitr Collection Launch 
2. Identification of beneficiaries 
3. Purchase of food or preparation of distributions 
4. Distribution before Eid 
5. Closing and reporting
beneficiaries: Children' living in households below poverty line

cb0e25a3-0b03-4529-bba6-72ebf30b7fc2.title: RAMADAN - SEASONAL BARAKA KIT
cb0e25a3-0b03-4529-bba6-72ebf30b7fc2.description:
Ramadan is a month of faith, peace, sharing… a month where families gather around a meal, where hearts come closer and where generosity illuminates homes.
But for some families, this sacred period is lived in anguish.
In the Ivory Coast, parents are wondering every day how to feed their children.
Mothers reduce their own meals so that their childrents can eat.
Families start the fast without knowing how they will break it in the evening.
No one should go hungry during Ramadan.
That's why Amane+ is launching Operation BARAKA KIT: an initiative to provide the most vulnerable families with essential food baskets so they can experience Ramadan with dignity, serenity and hope.
A Kit hasfood allows an entire family to eat during the holy month.
A Kit is an insured meal.
A Kit is a relief.
A kit is a dignity regained
Why give?
During Ramadan, food becomes a daily challenge for many families . Without help, they live this holy month in anguish, sometimes without meals to break theeûne.
Giving is responding to an immediate and vital need: to feed oneself with dignity.
How does your donation actually help?
Your contribution allows:
Guarantee daily meals throughout the month
To prevent parents from depriving themselves for their children
Reduce stress and food insecurity
Actual impact
Single KIT: </div>
 ✔ Feeds a family for 30 days
✔ Provides stability and serenity
✔ Allows you to live Ramadan with dignity
cb0e25a3-0b03-4529-bba6-72ebf30b7fc2.impact:
Provide complete food kits to vulnerable families throughout the month of Ramadan
Reduce food insecurity and allow a dignified and serene fasting break
Provide immediate and measurable support to 500 families in Abidjan
cb0e25a3-0b03-4529-bba6-72ebf30b7fc2.process:
1. Preparation of lists 1 month before Ramadan 
2. Ordering and storage of food
 3. Distribution 1:  After Day 10 
4. Distribution 2: after day 20 
 5. Evidence collection and closure
beneficiaries: Families enrolled in the Food Program

4c258f23-a0e9-4231-8801-354881646cd3.title: SCHOOLING DISADVANTAGED CHILDREN SADAQAH PERMANENT
4c258f23-a0e9-4231-8801-354881646cd3.description:
Breaking the cycle of poverty
“Say: Are those who know and those who do not know equal? (Quran 39:9)
Why give?
Without education, a child is deprived of a future.
Many drop out of school due to lack of resources.
Your gift changes a life trajectory.
How does your donation help?
Payment of tuition fees
Crazyrnitures scolaires
Uniforms and support
A child in school today is a transformed family tomorrow.
Sadaqah

support for the schooling of children in difficulty: registration fees, supplies, uniforms, scholarships and equipment.
4c258f23-a0e9-4231-8801-354881646cd3.impact:
Keep vulnerable children in the education system
Reduce the dropout rate linked to precariousness
Providing opportunities for the future through education
4c258f23-a0e9-4231-8801-354881646cd3.process:
1. Reception request (parent/guardian or partner institution)
 2. Verification of school status and family situation 
3. Operations team validation 
4. Direct payment establishment or discount kit 5. Monitoring of schooling (reports) 
6. Annual conditional renewal
beneficiaries: Orphans in school or to be in school

52e03d56-a64c-4f5b-af81-eb5a71f45267.title: SCHOOLING DISADVANTAGED CHILDREN PERMANENT ZAKAT
52e03d56-a64c-4f5b-af81-eb5a71f45267.description:
Zakat support for the schooling of disadvantaged children
Zakat is much more than an act of spiritual solidarity: it is a concrete lever to transform lives. Thanks to your contribution, we are launching a program dedicated to the schooling of children from fuqara (poor) and masakin (poor) families.
Why is this project essential?
• Education is a doorway to•Autonomy and dignity.
• Many families cannot afford school expenses, depriving their children of a better future.
• By directing Zakat towards schooling, you directly contribute to breaking the cycle of poverty.
real impact?
Your Zakat becomes an investment in the future of these children. Every donation is turned into an opportunity: a filled satchel, a validated inscription, a found smile.
52e03d56-a64c-4f5b-af81-eb5a71f45267.impact:
Enrollment fee: Enable each child to access school without cost being a barrier.
 Basic school supplies: notebooks, pens, school bags... everything you need to learn in good conditions.
 School uniforms: offer children a dignified and adapted outfit, promoting equality and integration.
52e03d56-a64c-4f5b-af81-eb5a71f45267.process:
1. Reception request (parent/guardian or partner institution) 
2. Verification of school status and family situation 
3. Poverty Scoring and ASNAF Validation 
4. Operations Validation + Shariah Committee 
5. Direct payment establishment or kit discount 
6. Monitoring of schooling (reports)
 7. Annual conditional renewal
beneficiaries: Orphans in school or to be in school

180a8d19-8cef-48e8-a28d-0fe1e09ed516.title: FOOD FOR NEEDY FAMILIES SADAQAH PERMANENT
180a8d19-8cef-48e8-a28d-0fe1e09ed516.description:
For the food security of vulnerable families

Why give?
• Precariousness does not stop after Ramadan.
• Thousands of families live in food insecurity all year round.
• Your donation becomes a vital support on a daily basis.
How does your donation help?
• Distribution of food baskets adapted to needsessentials.
• Targeted support for vulnerable families: widows, elderly, orphans.
• Reduced hunger and daily stress, so that each household regains a little serenity.
The impact of your gesture
• Feeding a family means giving it back strength and dignity.
• Every meal shared is a source of hope and a reminder of solidarity.
<div>• Your Sadaqah becomes a lasting light, far beyond the blessed month.
 Together, let's make generosity an ongoing support.

Your gift not only nourishes bodies, it nourishes hearts.
180a8d19-8cef-48e8-a28d-0fe1e09ed516.impact:
Ensure regular food assistance to vulnerable families
Reducing hunger and food insecurity outside of Ramadan
Sustainably support households in difficulty
180a8d19-8cef-48e8-a28d-0fe1e09ed516.process:
1. Household identification (field officer or request) 
2. Verification of situation and eligibility 
3. Mailing List Registration 
4. Batch validation by Operations team 
5. Preparation and distribution of baskets 
6. Beneficiary signature/fingerprint on app 
7. Geolocation and handover photo
beneficiaries: Large families with no stable income

be544090-dcd2-4737-8397-2ae7612c9095.title: FOOD FOR NEEDY FAMILIES PERMANENT ZAKAT
be544090-dcd2-4737-8397-2ae7612c9095.description:
Supporting families all year round
This programme consists of providing regular food aid to the most vulnerable families in order to combat food insecurity.
“They feed… the poor, the orphan and the captive. (Quran 76:8)
Why give?
Hunger is a daily reality for some families, well beyond Ramadan.
Unaidede, they live in permanent instability.
How does your donation actually help?
Distribution of food baskets
Provision of essential products
Support for vulnerable families
Actual impact
Hunger✔ reduction
✔ Improvement of living conditions
✔ Stability for families
be544090-dcd2-4737-8397-2ae7612c9095.impact: Combat food insecurity in the fuqara and masakin by providing staple foods in a regular and traceable manner.
be544090-dcd2-4737-8397-2ae7612c9095.process:

e5f41687-42ad-4495-8c8b-1d9483111381.title: HEALTH SUPPORT - ONGOING SADAQAH
e5f41687-42ad-4495-8c8b-1d9483111381.description:
Saving lives, at a time when everything is at stake
Emergency medical support consists of rapid intervention to finance the vital care of people facing critical situations requiring immediate care.
“Whoever saves one life, it is as if he has saved all mankind. (Quran 5:32)
Why give?
Every day, familiesare facing unforeseen medical emergencies: accidents, complications during childbirth, sudden illnesses.
Without immediate resources, access to care is delayed... with sometimes dramatic consequences.
Your donation helps to remove this critical barrier: the lack of means at the decisive moment.
How does your donation actually help?
Immediate management of urgent casesnts
Purchase of life-saving medicines
Funding for urgent medical examinations
Quick access to care facilities
Actual impact
✔ Lives saved
✔ Rapid and effective interventions
✔ Relieved families at critical times
e5f41687-42ad-4495-8c8b-1d9483111381.impact: Improve access to health care for all, without ASNAF category restrictions, through community and individual actions.
e5f41687-42ad-4495-8c8b-1d9483111381.process:
1. Receipt of project request or proposal
 2. Operational Due Diligence 
3. Operations + Foundation Team Validation 
4. Disbursement according to defined milestones
 5. Monitoring and collection of deliverables 
6. Impact reporting
beneficiaries: Any individual or household in medical difficulty
Rural communities without access to care
Patients in need of comfort or elective care
People who do not meet the Zakat criteria

3d43d29b-c5f5-44c7-8790-bf606918b7c8.title: HEALTH SUPPORT - PERMANENT ZAKAT
3d43d29b-c5f5-44c7-8790-bf606918b7c8.description:
Supporting patients over time
Ongoing medical support aims to ensure regular monitoring of people with chronic conditions requiring ongoing care.
“Allah helps the servant as long as the servant helps his brother." (Muslim)
Why give?
Some diseases require lifelong treatment.
Without regular follow-up, they worsent and lead to serious complications.
Your donation helps prevent patients from being left without care.
How does your donation actually help?
Regular medical consultations
Purchase of chronic drugs
Follow-up reviews
Long-term support
Actual impact
Patient✔ Stabilization
✔ Reduced serious complications
%s
3d43d29b-c5f5-44c7-8790-bf606918b7c8.impact:
Ensure regular monitoring of patients with chronic diseases
Prevent complications through continued access to treatment
Sustainably improve the quality of life of beneficiaries
3d43d29b-c5f5-44c7-8790-bf606918b7c8.process:
1. Request reception (web/app/field agent) 
2. Automatic or Agent Poverty Scoring 
3. Verification of documents and medical specifications 
4. Operations team validation 
5. Shariah Committee validation (asnaf verification) 
6. Disbursement to health facility 
7. Collection of proof of service 
8. Closing and reporting
beneficiaries: Households below the poverty line (score < country threshold)
Isolated elderly people with no income
